Still considering? Please read a few reviews, written by folks just like you:

http://www.atso.co/reviews/
http://facebook.com/AximTechnologySolutions
http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1153002
http://feedback.atso.co


We will try to answer some of your questions here as well:

Where is your server located?
Seattle, WA

What control panel software do you use?
All accounts are setup on cPanel/WHM with Zamfoo & Softaculous.

Do you have a test IP?
We sure do. Our cPanel test IP is, 66.171.178.29.

Are VPS accounts setup instantly?
They sure are. As long as your order doesn't get stuck in the system due to fraud and your payment is completed successfully, then your order will be setup instantly on our server and your details will be emailed to you as soon as the process is complete. In cases of custom VPS orders, those will be setup manually.

Can I upgrade at anytime?
You certainly can. Upgrades are completed via your Client Portal and can be done without the assistance of any staff and take effect instantly.

Are you on Facebook?
Yes, you can like us and link to us at http://facebook.com/AximTechnologySolutions

Are you on Twitter?
Absolutely. You can follow us at http://twitter.com/AximTS

Is Sofaculous on both cPanel/WHM and DirectAdmin servers?
Yes. We use it on both servers.

Is Zamfoo on both cPanel/WHM and DirectAdmin servers?
No. Zamfoo is only on our cPanel/WHM servers.

If you have any other questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.
